name: From Heaven Above
description:
From Heaven Above is the game that we worked on in 3 days at the global game jam 2018 in Turin, and which gained the potentially viral prime.

It’s a side scrolling platform in 2D in which the reptilian pope,  driving the pope mobile across the stars, has to convert the aliens by praying; every prayer will become an effective, powerful attack and will turn the aliens into angels.

So just...pray. Pray out loud.
